description:
The reaction to the first 'edge' video was a little surprising. I got a lot of mail. More mail than I have on anything I have put on the site before. I decided that I wanted to explore this theme, perhaps do a trilogy.
Mitch is good friends with Davis, who put in a good word for me. I wanted each one of these movies to be "different" yet basically the same. I knew I wanted to expand and do "more" in each video. I'm not sure what Mitch thought of all my planning, but it did take this straight guy a bit to warm up to the project. We started off thinking he would do a standard solo, but this came up instead.
In my mind, the typical edge video is a straight dude getting serviced. Yes, the shirt being left on is deliberate (please don't write me to start taking them off...its the "look and feel" I am going for). There will be photosets of Mitch shirtless. Don't worry..
Anyway, again, I'm not saying much (or showing much) in the previews about these videos, as it spoils the surprises sprinkled through out.
You just gotta trust me these videos are hot, and a little unexpected.
I will say there is some Snake Charming going on, as we get to see Mitch's dick get hard quickly on its own (ok, a little nudge here and there) and a very hot ending that bookends the snake charming sequence.
Remember. Don't Blink!
title: Bryan & Mitch - Edge
